content:
Hi,
I have a macbook pro with 256gb storage, so for compiling rust, it is a little few space if I want to save other things on it as well. I was wondering does anybody have experience with compiling https://github.com/rust-lang/rust from flash drive there? Is it so slow that you really don't want to do that?
I would really not recommend that, compiling rust is slow enough as is :sweat_smile:
if you want to take up less disk space, you could use system llvm and incremental = false
yeah, i was afraid of that... it probably will shuffle stuff via the usb pipe to cpu and back... :(
I don't think anyone has tried it, so it's probably worth giving it a shot.
@Gustav Lennart Voigt ow much RAM do you have?
